content: I love that you posted this feeling that we all have, but is hard to talk about. I’m trying to start a new writing project and every time I get rolling I read back over it I realize that it is just not as good as I want it to be. And yet, I keep trying because it will get better. I think the most important thing as a writer is to just keep writing. Some days it’s good and some days, like you said, it’s going to suck.
